problem.p: Consider the following code statement. Which one of the following would be the result?

choicegroup.label: week7gpt1input1
choicegroup.choice: The variable, lenOfStr, is set to 0.
The variable, lenOfStr, is set to 15.

div.p: "Is it possible?" is a String object. The length() instance method of the String class returns the number of characters of the String object, including white spaces. A value of 15 is returned when calling the length() method of the String object "Is it possible?". Thus, the variable lenOfStr is set to 15.
